query.name: header
query.script: select d.docnumb, d.docdate, upper(SUBSTR(p_tools_to_propis((select sum(COALESCE(c.summ,0)) from PAYDOCSCONS c where c.paydocsid = d.id)),1,1))|| lower(SUBSTR(p_tools_to_propis((select sum(COALESCE(c.summ,0)) from PAYDOCSCONS c where c.paydocsid = d.id)),2)) as summ_prop, k.INN as innec, k.KPP as kppec, (select sum(COALESCE(c.summ,0)) from PAYDOCSCONS c where c.paydocsid = d.id) as summ, k.name as electcommitteename, e.BANKACC as elcmtacccode, b.CODE as agentbanksec, b.BIC as bicbankec, COALESCE(bf.CODE,bj.CODE) as agentbank, COALESCE(bf.bic,bj.bic) as agentbankbic, COALESCE(pf.inn,pj.inn) as paydocinn, COALESCE(pf.kpp,pj.kpp) as paydockpp, e.bankacc as paydocsacc, COALESCE(f.name,a.name) as paydockpp, '01' as vid_op, d.PRIORITY as paydocsprior, d.PURPOSE as paydocspurpose, d.PURPOSE_CODE as purp_code from PAYACCOUNTS p inner join PAYDOCS d on d.payaccountsid = p.id left join JURPERSONS j on j.id = p.jurpersonsid left join ELECTCOMMITTEE k on k.id = j.electcommitteeid left join ELCMTACC e on e.id = p.elcmtaccid left join AGENTBANKS b on b.id = e.agentbanksid left join PERSONACC pf on pf.id = d.personaccdocid --счет физлица left join AGENTBANKS bf on bf.id = pf.agentbanksid left join PERSONACC pj on pj.id = d.agentaccid --счет юрлица left join AGENTBANKS bj on bj.id = pj.agentbanksid left join PERSON f on f.id = d.personid left join AGENT a on a.id = d.agentid where d.id = ${id}::bigint ;
